privacy_intro_text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.
privacy_data_collection_intro: We collect the following types of data:
privacy_data_personal: Personal information (name, email, phone number) when you register or contact us
privacy_data_usage: Usage data (how you interact with our platform)
privacy_data_technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)
privacy_data_cookies: Cookie data for functionality and analytics
privacy_data_usage_intro: We use your data for the following purposes:
privacy_usage_service: To provide and improve our services
privacy_usage_communication: To communicate with you about your account and our services
privacy_usage_improvement: To analyze and improve our platform
privacy_data_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform, subject to strict confidentiality agreements. We may also disclose data if required by law or to protect our rights and safety.
privacy_cookies_text: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Some cookies are essential for the platform to function properly.
privacy_security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
privacy_rights_intro: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
privacy_right_access: Right to access your personal data
privacy_right_rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
privacy_right_erasure: Right to erasure of your data
privacy_contact_text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at contact@peak-soft.de or +49 1525 3296640.
privacy_changes_text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.
